scripts.install_all: cd fptcore && npm install && cd ../headquarters && npm install && npm rebuild && cd ../apps/travel && npm install && cd ../../apps/agency && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cs ../travel2 && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test_core && npm run test_agency && npm run test_hq && npm run test_travel2
scripts.build_travel2: cd apps/travel2; export NODE_ENV=production; npm run build
scripts.build_agency: cd apps/agency; export NODE_ENV=production; npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build_travel && npm run build_travel2 && npm run build_agency
scripts.watch_travel2: export $(cat ./secrets/local.env | xargs); cd apps/travel2; npm run watch
scripts.watch_travel2_devserver: export $(cat ./secrets/local.env | xargs); cd apps/travel2; npm run dev
scripts.watch_agency: export $(cat ./secrets/local.env | xargs); cd apps/agency; npm run watch
scripts.watch_agency_devserver: export $(cat ./secrets/local.env | xargs); cd apps/agency; npm run dev
scripts.watch: npm run watch_travel & npm run watch_travel2 & npm run watch_travel2_devserver & npm run watch_agency & npm run watch_agency_devserver
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:db && npm run migrate:scripts
scripts.migrate:scripts: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate:scripts
scripts.migrate:examples: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate:examples
scripts.deploy: git fetch; git branch -f production `git rev-parse origin/main`; git push -f origin production
